snippet.title: Soul Shifter Short Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Which secrets may be resting in the dungeons? 
Uncover the secrets of your own existence while fighting your way through the depths of the dungeon. 
In Soul Shifter, the player breaks through the ruins of what was once the most glorious of the castles and discovers the secrets behind the magical elemental energy that brought prosperity but also disgrace to the kingdom.


Check Soul Shifter on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/14...


Follow us on social media:
